title: Trumpmerica Strikes Again! Waitress Receives Racist Note From Couple Who Claim They 'Don't Tip Black People'
text:
1/09/2017 6:17   Icky Icky Poo • Politik • Sad Sad • Viral: News • Controversy • Social Issues 
This kind of behavior is inexcusable! 
Over the weekend, an African-American waitress at Anita's New Mexico Style Cafe in Virginia experienced an awful and unacceptable encounter with racism. 
Related: Waitress Gets Incredibly Sexist Note From Donald Trump Supporting Couple! 
According to veteran server Kelly Carter , she happily catered to a couple enjoying the restaurant's Saturday brunch menu. The pair seemed happy during the duration of their meal and Carter noted no problems while serving them. 
It's only when the waitress looked at the $30.52 bill that she realized she had been a victim of racism. 
As you can see (below), the racist couple left no tip and defended themselves by writing that they "don't tip black people". The gross pair even went as far to commend Kelly for her "great service", which is especially cruel considering. 
Take a look at the offensive receipt (below): 
In a comment to NBC Washington , Ms. Carter expressed her shock, explaining: 
"I looked at the receipt three times." 
So awful. 
Video: Fox News Airs Shockingly Racist Chinatown Segment! 
Following the upsetting news, Anita's president Thomas Tellez revealed his outrage over the incident, telling the outlet: 
"It's disheartening; I'm outraged. I was appalled, though it's kind of in line with the political landscape, unfortunately." 
Despite Kelly's hurt and pain over the incident, she's not going to let the unfortunate situation get her down. In fact, the server claims she'd wait on the couple if they visit the establishment again. 
Carter explained: 
"I keep my head up. I have to keep moving. One hateful remark can not stop me. My arms are still opened to him. That's him, not me." 
Wow, what a class act! We're truly humbled by Kelly's sense of compassion and dignity.
